title: Correct a Coding Error
description: An audit has revealed that an incorrect diagnosis code was used on a claim that has already been submitted. A coder needs to correct it.

tasks.description: Locate the claim with the incorrect code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder finds the specific claim that needs correction.

tasks.description: Review the documentation and determine the correct diagnosis code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder identifies the accurate code that should have been used.

tasks.description: Submit a corrected claim to the payer with the updated diagnosis code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder successfully submits a replacement claim to the insurance company.
